alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 9:27AM MST until February 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 13 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Gregory, Brule, Charles Mix, Bon Homme and Yankton Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory; Yankton
